2091.subject: ASAP
2091.descrlong: Provides supplemental support for senior capstone courses. Students work in small groups  or in an individual semester-long appointment with a tutor from the Academic Skills Achievement Program (ASAP), and receive assistance on parts of the writing process including: organizing research, finding a topic, formulating a thesis, developing content, and proofreading strategies . Must be taken concurrently with a Senior Capstone 400 course. Credit/no credit only. (Offered every semester.)
